ygData.subject: Re: Soulfire
ygData.msgSnippet: I -heard- that it is back in. Also I saw a report on EQVault that someone got a Soulfire a couple days ago. Of course, EQVault is full of shit and I m not a
ygData.messageBody:
I -heard- that it is back in. Also I saw a report on EQVault that someone
got a Soulfire a couple days ago. Of course, EQVault is full of shit and I'm
not a paladin, so.... good luck :)

----- Original Message -----

: From: Phillip Ratliff <p_ratliff@...>
:
: I agree that we don't need all these people advertising crap the list,
: but dont rant to us, send a personal email to THEM. BTW, Does anyone
: know if the Soulfire quest is nerfed forever? I was one of them trying
: to get a long time ago and they screwed that one quest guy so it broke
: the quest. Anyone know if they've fixed it yet???
